entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:35 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 8:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
Temperature: -20.4°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: N 48 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending overnight then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 20 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow at times. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 05 March 2023
